## Setup chunk

```{r setup}
source(here::here("data-raw", "nmr-omics.R"), print.eval = FALSE)
source(here::here("R/functions.R"))
load_description_packages()
tar_config_set(store = here::here("_targets"))
lipidomics <- tar_read(lipidomics)
```

## Making a table

```{r}
tar_read(descriptive_table) |>
  knitr::kable(
    caption = "The mean and standard deviation of metabolites in the lipidomics dataset."
  )
```

## plot distribution

```{r}
tar_read(plot_distribution)
```
